name: My Cute Skeleton! Dress-up Time~
description:
In this game, you can use six different items to make your cute skeleton pal even CUTER! They're a bit nervous, but have complete faith that you'll make em look super cool!

Hint: Installing the "Pixelsix 10" font will make the experience even COOLER!

http://www.dafont.com/pixelsix.font

Left Mouse - select/place

Right Mouse - Remove

Middle Mouse Click - Mirror object

Image sharing via twitter will be added in a later update, but please share your images and tweet under the #MyCuteSkeleton hashtag!
